statements: SELECT * FROM geofence_events
SELECT event_id, device_id, event_type FROM geofence_events
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM geofence_events WHERE geofence_id = 1
SELECT event_id, device_id, geofence_name FROM geofence_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC
SELECT device_id, event_type, geofence_name FROM geofence_events WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM geofence_events WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT event_id, device_id, event_type FROM geofence_events WHERE geofence_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT device_id, geofence_name FROM geofence_events WHERE event_type = 'entry' OR event_type = 'exit'
SELECT * FROM geofence_events WHERE geofence_name LIKE '%Park%' AND event_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS event_count FROM geofence_events GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY event_count DESC
SELECT * FROM geofence_data WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT geofence_name, entry_time FROM geofence_data WHERE id = 5;
SELECT coordinates FROM geofence_data WHERE device_id = 2 AND exit_time IS NULL;
SELECT id, message FROM notifications WHERE device_id = 3 ORDER BY sent_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE notification_type = 'Alert' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, geofence_name, coordinates FROM geofence_data WHERE device_id = 1234 ORDER BY entry_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, notification_type, message FROM notifications WHERE sent_time > '2022-01-01' AND notification_type = 'Alert'
SELECT * FROM notifications INNER JOIN geofence_data ON notifications.device_id = geofence_data.device_id WHERE geofence_name LIKE '%Home%' ORDER BY sent_time ASC
SELECT geofence_name, entry_time, exit_time FROM geofence_data WHERE exit_time IS NOT NULL AND entry_time < exit_time
SELECT device_id, COUNT(id) AS num_notifications FROM notifications GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY num_notifications DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM geofences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM geofences WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, name FROM devices ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT device_id, notification_text, timestamp FROM notifications WHERE device_id = 5;
SELECT DISTINCT name FROM devices;
SELECT name, location FROM geofences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, notification_text, timestamp FROM notifications WHERE device_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, name, current_location::text AS current_location FROM devices;
SELECT * FROM Geofences;
SELECT geofence_name, geofence_coordinates FROM Geofences WHERE geofence_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_status FROM Devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT log_id, device_id, geofence_id, log_timestamp FROM GeofenceLogs WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT notification_type, notification_message FROM Notifications WHERE notification_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Geofences;
SELECT geofence_name, geofence_coordinates FROM Geofences WHERE geofence_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Devices JOIN GeofenceLogs ON Devices.device_id = GeofenceLogs.device_id WHERE device_status = 'active';
SELECT Geofences.geofence_name, Notifications.notification_type FROM Geofences LEFT JOIN Notifications ON Geofences.geofence_id = Notifications.log_id;
SELECT device_name, log_timestamp FROM Devices JOIN GeofenceLogs ON Devices.device_id = GeofenceLogs.device_id ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM geofence_locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude FROM geofence_locations WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofence_locations;
SELECT location_name FROM geofence_locations WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM geofence_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofence_locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM geofence_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -70;
SELECT location_name, latitude FROM geofence_locations WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM geofence_locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, location_name FROM geofence_locations WHERE longitude >= -80 AND longitude <= -70 ORDER BY id DESC;
